TopicTitle: Hello! I have just returned to the forums (and ksp itself) after a few years and need to ask a question.

Articles.Content:
I'll admit, I made this account when I was pretty young and inexperienced with the game. And I made some stupid regrettable posts asking really really dumb questions;
So I want to get rid of 'em, How do I go about removing a post? Thanks in advance!

Howdy!

We normally do not like to delete user posts at their request, for a few reasons. 

  • Any helpful answers you received are likely helpful to other players too.
  • If we hide a thread you started, that also wipes out posts that other users have made in that thread, which isn’t fair to them.
  • It takes up our precious moderator time.   

However, if you have a specific post or thread you would like us to consider hiding, let us know.  Tell you what, how about you send me a PM with links to your threads or posts that you are concerned about.  We will see what we can do for you.

Also, welcome back to the forums!
You could either go back and edit the posts yourself, or if it really bothers you, you could ask for the entire account to be deleted.
